content: As an AI language model language model, I don't have personal preferences or recommendations, but it depends on your interests. If you're interested in history and culture, Mostar Old Bridge Area and the Old City of Sarajevo are must-visit sites. If you're interested in architecture, then Mehmed Paša Sokolović Bridge in Višegrad is a good choice. If you enjoy nature, then the natural and architectural ensemble of the Pocitelj village could be ideal for you.
